title: Judy (Mia Wasikowski) puppeteer costume
credit_line:
Cutting by Julie Skelton

Construction by Lyn Molloy

Courtesy Vice Media LLC, Blue-Tongue Films and Pariah Productions
material_description: new and re-purposed materials, cotton, linen, synthetic
brief_description:
Judy and Judy’s stunt double’s red puppeteer costume (Judy Shirt, Judy Jacket) from the 2019 film Judy and Punch (Bluetongue Films)

Part of Edie Kurzer (costume designer) proposed ‘Judy and Punch’ donation 2019
